mission_data.mission_description: The newly restored TSN Diana is now returning to active service in the war against the Arvonian/Torgoth alliance. The Artemis and Diana are sent back into enemy territory, on a mission to try to break up the enemy alliance.^^This mission is a sequel to "The Diana Operation 2".

big_message.title: The Diana Operation III: Return to Elysia
big_message.subtitle2: An adventure for one or two ships for Artemis 2.7

event.name: All Player Ships Destroyed

warning_popup_message.message: Diana must be a Light Cruiser

folder_arme.name: Task: Dock with Houston Outpost to receive orders

disabled_event.name: TSN Command summons ships
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: All TSN ships in this sector are directed to dock at Houston Outpost immediately to receive new mission orders.

disabled_event.name: TSN Command summons ships again
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: We repeat, all TSN ships in this sector are directed to dock at Houston Outpost immediately to receive new mission orders!

disabled_event.name: GM summons ships again
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: We repeat, all TSN ships in this sector are directed to dock at Houston Outpost immediately to receive new mission orders!

disabled_event.name: Task Succeeded - 1 Ship Docked
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: The TSN Diana recently went on a secret mission into enemy territory beyond the asteroid belt to scout out a recently discovered unstable wormhole. Unfortunately, all contact from the Diana has since been lost. Your mission is to find out what happened to her, and return her to a TSN station if possible. If not, make sure she is destroyed. We cannot risk her falling into enemy hands.

disabled_event.name: Task Succeeded - 2 Ships Docked
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: The TSN Diana recently went on a secret mission into enemy territory beyond the asteroid belt to scout out a recently discovered unstable wormhole. Unfortunately, all contact from the Diana has since been lost. Your mission is to find out what happened to her, and return her to a TSN station if possible. If not, make sure she is destroyed. We cannot risk her falling into enemy hands.

disabled_event.name: GM give mission
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: The TSN Diana recently went on a secret mission into enemy territory beyond the asteroid belt to scout out a recently discovered unstable wormhole. Unfortunately, all contact from the Diana has since been lost. Your mission is to find out what happened to her, and return her to a TSN station if possible. If not, make sure she is destroyed. We cannot risk her falling into enemy hands.

log.text: Houston Outpost destroyed before giving orders

disabled_event.name: Mission Failed - Out of time

log.text: Did not receive missions orders in time

disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: You did not follow orders from TSN Command in time!

warning_popup_message.message: Artemis: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
Artemis was destroyed by the wormhole!
warning_popup_message.name: Artemis

warning_popup_message.message: Diana: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
Diana has entered the wormhole. Gravity is normal.
warning_popup_message.name: Diana

warning_popup_message.message: The Diana has entered the wormhole.
Diana: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
The Diana has exited the wormhole.
Diana: Gravity well hazard. Proceed cautiously.
The Diana has re-entered the wormhole!
The Diana has re-entered the wormhole!
